about_the_game:
SimVoiceAssistant is an addon that provides voice activated checklists functionality for any flight simulator. When used with Microsoft Flight Simulator it provides additional functionality.

Features

  • Create Your Own Voice Activated Checklists.
  • Challenge/Response style checklists or say 'Check' to advance any checklist available.
  • [MSFS Only] Automatic flight phase detection based checklist changing
  • [MSFS Only] Voice controlled pushback with voice and rudder controlled pushback angle

SimVoiceAssistant is for simulation use ONLY and is not an aviation training tool. SimVoiceAssistant is for entertainment purposes only.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 Minimum Resolution
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Microphone required
  • Additional Notes: Your Windows speech recognition language must be set to English/German/French with English/German/French voices installed. You must also have .NET 4.7.1 installed.
